title: WAS Lead
tagsAndSkills: Training,RCA,Administration,Websphere,Database,JDBC,Mentor,Deployment
jobDescription:
• WAS Admin Lead roleLocation Navi Mumbai, BelapurEducational Qualification BE/B
  • Tech (any branch)/ MCA/M
  • Tech/ MSC IT / MSC CS 24/ Support Environment 6 days a week (Monthly Twice) Banking industry experience (Good to have) Documents required for BV purpose (Must have EPFO service history records with supporting documents for past 5 years)ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIESDeployment of EAR WAR files on Web Sphere Application Server and Network Deployment Manger
  • Installation and configuration of WebSphere application server Webserver in different environments in Production and DR
  • Administrating and monitoring tasks related to the support of Web Sphere Application Server with IBM (PMR)
  • Co-ordination with all the merchants, branch and core team
  • Preparing reports of health of all the sites, and keeping relevant stakeholders informed
  • Escalating issues to higher level till their closure
  • Configured WebSphere Application Server with Database
  • Configuring of JDBC Providers, Data Source, Virtual Hosting
  • As per the requirements planning and implementation of Fix packs, refresh packs Migration of version
  • Creating Nodes, clusters and cluster members
  • Generating and implementing the SSL certificates in Different environments
  • Deploying WAC configuration files and verifies status after deployment
  • Co-ordinating with QK regarding escalation of the sites
  • Preparation for standalone DR and IBCE DR dril activityIntimating to all customers about DR activity and Downtime
  • Preparing RCA's and coordinate with respecting teams
  • Document issues and associated resolutions to problems
  • Prepare documentation and presentation of progress reports to customers
  • Conduct users, customers and Teams training
  • Guide/Mentor the team members on technical problems which cannot be resolved at their level
  • Ensure that Systems, Organization processes, Unit practices adhere to Organization policies
  • Active participation in Organization and Unit level initiatives

title: Senior Software Engineer - Mobile App (iOS)
tagsAndSkills: IT services,Performance tuning,Automation,XML,Consulting,JSON,SDK,IOS
jobDescription:
Full time [Monday - Friday]. Employees are required to have flexibility to work any of our 9-hour shift schedules during our normal business hours of (6am - 10pm IST) or (6pm to 6am IST). It may be necessary, given the business need, to work occasional overtime [unpaid].
 
Qualification
 
ME / M.TECH / BE / B.TECH / MCA / M.Sc(IT) etc
 
Technical/Functional Skills
 
Experience with Xamarin.

Excellent understanding of Mobile technologies in depth experience building mobile applications on iOS.
Experience with REST/SOAP/JSON/XML web services is a must.
Experience with iOS SDK a must. Hands-on with SQLite needed.
Experience building mobile apps that interact with scalable secure web services is a must.

Good Knowledge of SDLC and Agile Methodology.
Strong Verbal and Written Communication Skills.
Excellent analytical skills for resolving ongoing Tasks Issues and Consulting on problems.
Ability to work accurately, with good attention to detail.
 
Roles Responsibilities
 
Developing and Maintaining dynamic mobile applications on iOS.
Documentation of Technical Designs as required.
Developing maintaining highly efficient production level code and prototypes with an instinct for reusability.
Being proficient in performance Tuning, Balancing, Usability, Automation, Unit Test Plans.
Participating in Design, Testing phase successful delivery of the SDLC.
Involvement in the Project and Sprint Planning.
Communicate effectively with Project Managers, Technical Leads, Internet Strategists and other Internal Team Members.
